data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Epexochus Reitter, with description of three new species (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Lixinae: Cleonini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Meregalli, Massimo, Talamelli, Fabio (2009): Revision of the genus Epexochus Reitter, with description of three new species (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Lixinae: Cleonini). Zootaxa 2011: 47-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274687
